```{r}
library(tidyverse)

mid_dispute <- read_csv("MIDA_4.2.csv")
mid_participant <- read_csv("MIDB_4.2.csv")

theme_set(theme_light())

```

## Which countries have been more likely to be involved in MID over time?

```{r}
mid_participant %>% 
  select(styear, stabb) %>% 
  add_count(stabb) %>% 
  filter(n > 150) %>% 
  group_by(styear) %>% 
  count(stabb) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = styear, y = nn)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~ stabb)


```
